title: Import an existing Astro application
description: Import an existing Astro application into the Nx workspace

source.description: Path to the existing Astro project to import
source.x-prompt: What is the path to the existing Astro project?

name.description: Name for the project in the Nx workspace
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the project?

directory.description: Directory where the project will be placed (relative to workspace root)
directory.x-prompt: Where should the project be placed? (e.g., apps/my-app)

tags.description: Comma-separated tags to apply to the project
tags.x-prompt: What tags would you like to add to the project? (comma-separated)

importPath.description: Custom TypeScript path alias for importing from this project
importPath.x-prompt: What TypeScript path alias would you like to use? (optional, press Enter to auto-generate)
